name: Airport Rush
description:
You have a very important flight to catch, and it leaves in less than a minute !

You need to hurry up if you want to catch your flight in time ! Pass through the passersby, manage your way to the plane, but be careful about your suitcase ; it's old, tends to open very easily, and you obviously can't afford to fly away without your clothes...

This game was developed as a submission to the  2020 Quarantine Jam, hosted by LebGameDev, LayalHF, CARL FARRA!! and NightWatcher. The theme  was "Pack" ; we decided to play around a pack of people, along with the packed suitcase.

Developers : Enora GICQUEL, Florentin BENARD

Game Designer : Eric LAMAISON

Graphic Artist :  Joris MAGRAS

The music used in the game is called Metropolis Rush, and was composed by Johan Brodd. It is downloadable on OpenGameArt.org.
